name: Bonnie
description: A friendly and highly efficient human barmaid at the Yawning Portal. She has a somewhat cynical view of the endless stream of adventurers who pass through, but serves them all with professional grace.
ideals: Service: 'A full mug and a clean table. That's how you keep the peace.'
Pragmatism: 'Heroes and fools look the same until the job's done. They all pay for their ale, though.'
bonds: The Yawning Portal is her workplace and her world.
The few regular patrons who treat her like a person, not just a servant.
flaws: Quick to judge newcomers as naive or arrogant.
Tends to keep an emotional distance from the adventurers she serves.
motivations: To earn a good, honest living.
To keep the taproom running smoothly amidst the chaos.
To one day own a quieter tavern of her own.

canned_conversations.introduction: Well met. What can I get for you?
canned_conversations.ask_about_adventurers: Many adventurers pass through the Yawning Portal on their way to greatness. All of them try the ale.
canned_conversations.ask_about_the_portal: The Well? Costs a gold piece to go down. The coming back up part is trickier. Best of luck to 'em.
